```{r echo=FALSE}
library(magrittr)

card_summary <- params$card_summary
```

##### CARD database

Addtionally, the pipeline produces a summary table of genes annotated from [CARD database](https://card.mcmaster.ca/) since it has a comprehensive catalog of AMR genes.

```{r echo=FALSE, comment="", eval=TRUE}
df <- read.delim(params$card_summary, header = TRUE, sep = "\t")
df
```
